verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh!<s%> Let my <S%H7775>cry<s%> come to <S%H935>you.<s%>

<S%H5641>Don't<s%> hide your <S%H6440>face<s%> from me in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H6862>distress.<s%> <S%H5186>Turn<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%> to <S%H6030>me.<s%> Answer me <S%H4118>quickly<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when I <S%H7121>call.<s%>
For my <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H3615>consume<s%> away like <S%H6227>smoke.<s%> My <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H2787>burned<s%> as a <S%H4168>torch.<s%>
My <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H5221>blighted<s%> like <S%H6212>grass,<s%> and <S%H3001>withered,<s%> for I <S%H7911>forget<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> my <S%H3899>bread.<s%>
By reason of the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H585>groaning,<s%> my <S%H6106>bones<s%> stick to my <S%H1320>skin.<s%>
I am <S%H1819>like<s%> a <S%H6893>pelican<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%> I have become as an <S%H3563>owl<s%> of the waste <S%H2723>places.<s%>
I <S%H8245>watch,<s%> and have become like a <S%H6833>sparrow<s%> that is <S%H909>alone<s%> on the <S%H1406>housetop.<s%>
My <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H2778>reproach<s%> me all <S%H3117>day.<s%> Those who are <S%H1984>mad<s%> at me use my name as a <S%H7650>curse.<s%>
For I have <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H665>ashes<s%> like <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H4537>mixed<s%> my <S%H8249>drink<s%> with <S%H1065>tears,<s%>
<S%H6440>Because<s%> of your <S%H2195>indignation<s%> and your <S%H7110>wrath,<s%> for you have taken me <S%H5375>up,<s%> and thrown me <S%H7993>away.<s%>
My <S%H3117>days<s%> are like a <S%H5186>long<s%> <S%H6738>shadow.<s%> I have <S%H3001>withered<s%> like <S%H6212>grass.<s%>
But <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh, will <S%H3427>remain<s%> <S%H5769>forever;<s%> your renown <S%H3427>endures<s%> to <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
You will <S%H6965>arise<s%> and have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on <S%H6726>Zion;<s%> for it is <S%H6256>time<s%> to have <S%H2603>pity<s%> on <S%H4150>her.<s%> Yes, the set time has <S%H935>come.<s%>
For your <S%H5650>servants<s%> take <S%H7521>pleasure<s%> in her <S%H68>stones,<s%> and have <S%H2603>pity<s%> on her <S%H6083>dust.<s%>
So the <S%H1471>nations<s%> will <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> your <S%H3519>glory.<s%>
For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has built <S%H1129>up<s%> <S%H6726>Zion.<s%> He has <S%H7200>appeared<s%> in his <S%H3519>glory.<s%>
He has <S%H6437>responded<s%> to the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of the <S%H6199>destitute,<s%> and has not <S%H959>despised<s%> their <S%H8605>prayer.<s%>
This will be <S%H3789>written<s%> for the <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H314>come.<s%> A <S%H5971>people<s%> which will be <S%H1254>created<s%> will <S%H1984>praise<s%> <S%H3050>Yah.<s%>
For he has looked <S%H8259>down<s%> from the <S%H4791>height<s%> of his <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%> From <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5027>saw<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%>
to <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H603>groans<s%> of the <S%H615>prisoner;<s%> to <S%H6605>free<s%> those who are <S%H1121>condemned<s%> to <S%H8546>death;<s%>
that men may <S%H5608>declare<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and his <S%H8416>praise<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%>
when the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> are <S%H6908>gathered<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms,<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
He <S%H6031>weakened<s%> my <S%H3581>strength<s%> along the <S%H1870>course.<s%> He <S%H7114>shortened<s%> my <S%H3117>days.<s%>

I <S%H559>said,<s%> "My <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H5927>don't<s%> take me away in the <S%H2677>midst<s%> of my <S%H3117>days.<s%> Your <S%H8141>years<s%> are throughout <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
Of <S%H6440>old,<s%> you laid the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%> The <S%H8064>heavens<s%> are the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

They will <S%H6>perish,<s%> but you will <S%H5975>endure.<s%> <S%H1086>Yes,<s%> all of them will wear out like a <S%H899>garment.<s%> You will <S%H2498>change<s%> them like a <S%H3830>cloak,<s%> and they will be <S%H2498>changed.<s%>
But you are the <S%H8141>same.<s%> Your years will have no <S%H8552>end.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of your <S%H5650>servants<s%> will <S%H7931>continue.<s%> Their <S%H2233>seed<s%> will be <S%H3559>established<s%> before <S%H6440>you.<s%>"
